scripts.prerender-html: node scripts/prerender.js && node src/server/prerender.js && rm src/server/prerender.js
scripts.prerender-theme-css: yarn sass --load-path=node_modules --no-source-map --style=compressed src/stylesheets/theme.scss build/stylesheets/theme.css && yarn prettier --tab-width 2 --use-tabs false --write build/stylesheets/theme.css
scripts.prerender-prose-css: yarn sass --load-path=node_modules --no-source-map --style=compressed src/stylesheets/prose.scss build/stylesheets/prose.css && yarn prettier --tab-width 2 --use-tabs false --write build/stylesheets/prose.css
scripts.start: rm -rf build && mkdir build && yarn concurrently 'yarn prerender-html' 'yarn prerender-skeleton-css' 'yarn prerender-theme-css' 'yarn prerender-prose-css' && node scripts/start.js
scripts.build: rm -rf build && mkdir build && yarn concurrently 'yarn prerender-html' 'yarn prerender-skeleton-css' 'yarn prerender-theme-css' 'yarn prerender-prose-css' && NODE_ENV=production node scripts/build.js
